name: Magic Poï for Oculus Quest
description:
Magic Poï is a juggling experiment for Oculus Quest created during a Creative Jam. Feel free to try it. Be save with your hardware. Nice to see how good the Touch Insight works.

Download and Install:

1. Install SideQuest

2. Download the APK

3. Plug your Quest on the PC and install the APK by dragging it in SideQuest

4. Find a long string and make a node to your Touch

5. Enjoy PS: I am not responsible of any damage done to your Touch. Play at your own risk. If you play this game, we warn you to put protection around the Touch. Apparently Christmas plastic balls were enough for us.

Download code:  https://gitlab.com/eloistree/2019_09_15_magicpoi
